changeSet.author: wensy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `sys_user` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `username` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '账号', `password` varchar(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '密码', `real_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '真实姓名', `mobile` char(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '手机号码', `id_number` varchar(18) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '证件号码', `is_locked` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1.锁定，0.正常', `is_enable` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1.启用，0.禁用', `is_delete` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1.删除，0.正常', `create_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建日期', `creator_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人id', `creator_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人姓名', `update_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新日期', `update_id` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '更新人id', `update_name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '更新人姓名', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB COMMENT='用户信息表';

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from sys_user where id = 1469301104255832064;

changeSet.author: wensy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `sys_role` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `role_code` varchar(15) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '角色代码', `role_name` varchar(15) NOT NULL COMMENT '角色名称', `is_enable` tinyint DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1.启用，0.禁用', `is_delete` tinyint DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1.删除，0.正常', `create_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB COMMENT='角色信息表';

changeSet.author: wensy

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from sys_role where id = 1469301104255832064;

changeSet.author: wensy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `sys_identity` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `user_id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '用户主键', `role_id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '角色主键', `is_used` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1.目前使用的角色，0.未使用角色', `create_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB COMMENT='用户-角色关联信息表';

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from sys_identity where id = 1469301104255832064;
